author: Harry Craddock
description: A Gin Sour sweetened with orange liqueur. Harry Craddock's original 1930 recipe calls for 1 part lemon, 1 part triple sec, and 2 parts gin. Depending on your lemons, this tends to produce an overly sour drink hence I've reduced the citrus and added a touch of sugar.
name: Fine & Dandy
